thread.title: PPC user
thread.title_full: B&H Photo-Video reviewed by PPC user

author: PPC user
title: PPC user
text: I use B&H Photo-Video for my photo and video needs since 2001. Their website is top notch, packaging job is excellent. Shipping is immediate and I get everything the next day. I prefer them compared to amazon.com any time of a day. Keep up great work and may God of Abraham, Isaac and Jacob continue to bless B&H Photo-Video. I made some large purchases for my church as well. B&H Photo-Video delivers each time. Very glad to shop here. Thank you Jews for bringing salvation to all mankind through Jesus the Messiah. May God bless you for that forever.
